description.S1: The Groundbreaker's Mardets have a bounty for a criminal on the run in the Groundbreaker's Back Bays.
description.S2: You've agreed to hunt down the unlawful Captain Gunnar MacRedd.
description.S3: Return his lighter to Commandant Sanita to claim the bounty.

blurb.B1: This quest is obtained at Groundbreaker,
blurb.B2: by speaking to Comdt. Sanita or perusing the bounty board

O1.summary: Hunt Down and Kill Captain McRedd

description.S1: Based on the bounty listing, Captain McRedd was last sighted in the Back Bays.
description.S2: Head there and take him out.

blurb.B1: You can find Captain MacRedd in the Back Bays area of the Groundbreaker.
blurb.B2: To get there head down the elevator in the promenade,
blurb.B4: You can pass a Persuade (40) check to get him to put his gun down,
blurb.B5: otherwise you'll have to kill him and all his guards.
blurb.B6: If you kill him he drops the Unique Weapon: Montag.
blurb.B8: If you persuaded him, use Perception to note it says "Sanita" on the lighter.
blurb.B9: MacRedd will mention it was given to him by Sanita in remembrance of a 'carnal understanding' they had a few years back.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Unless you're here to file an incident report or to inquire about the bounty posting, I must kindly ask you to clear out. The Mardet's offices aren't for leisure time nor loitering.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm interested in that MacRedd bounty. Where can I find him?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What bounties do you have available?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So what's it like, working security detail on a space station?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll be on my way.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Last tip we got pointed toward the Back Bays. You want the reward? Do the legwork.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Why don't you send a Mardet to apprehend him?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll think about it.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, I will. Soon as the Chief approves the personnel re-org required for a bounty dispatch. So in about three to seven weeks.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Suit yourself. Not everyone's cut out for detective work and so forth. I understand.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Still waitin' to hear back on that bounty for MacRedd. That aside, not much else - Groundbreaker's keepin' calm at the moment.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Nothing excessive, mind you. But the scoundrel deserves a light beating at least before he kicks off.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Forget about the bounty for now. I want to talk with you about something else.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm working on it.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Have at it, then.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Do I look like your gossipy best friend? While I'm on post, I take my duties real serious. I would have no qualms whatsoever escorting you to a cell. Understand?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Fine, fine.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Whoa, all right. Just trying to make conversation.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Hey! No one talks to me like that.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Then get to business or get moving.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm not here for a chat. Now get moving before I see you moved.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Now, let's not start a fuss. I'm just trying to do my job, and I can't do it while chit-chatting with you.
